typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		userId as integer,
		id as string,
		title as string,
		completed as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> JsonSrc
DerivedColumn1 call(mapColumn(
		lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	output(
		headers as [string,string],
		body as (completed as string, id as string, title as string, userId as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	store: 'restservice',
	format: 'rest',
	timeout: 30,
	httpMethod: 'GET',
	requestFormat: ['type' -> 'json'],
	responseFormat: ['type' -> 'json', 'documentForm' -> 'singleDocument']) ~> ExternalCall1
JsonSrc derive(lkp = "/title") ~> DerivedColumn1
